description: Provides details regarding the entity used with the connection type, with a description of the data model for each field in the selected entity. The response includes all the fields which make up the entity.

parameters.name: ConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the connection that contains the connection type credentials.

parameters.name: EntityName
parameters.description: The name of the entity that you want to describe from the connection type.

nested_items.name: Fields
nested_items.description: Describes the fields for that connector entity. This is the list of Field objects. Field is very similar to column in a database. The Field object has information about different properties associated with fields in the connector.

nested_items.name: FieldName
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the field.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: A readable label used for the field.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the field.

nested_items.name: FieldType
nested_items.description: The type of data in the field.

nested_items.name: IsPrimaryKey
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this field can used as a primary key for the given entity.

nested_items.name: IsNullable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this field can be nullable or not.

nested_items.name: IsRetrievable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this field can be added in Select clause of SQL query or whether it is retrievable or not.

nested_items.name: IsFilterable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this field can used in a filter clause ( WHERE clause) of a SQL statement when querying data.

nested_items.name: IsPartitionable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a given field can be used in partitioning the query made to SaaS.

nested_items.name: IsCreateable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this field can be created as part of a destination write.

nested_items.name: IsUpdateable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this field can be updated as part of a destination write.

nested_items.name: IsUpsertable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this field can be upserted as part of a destination write.

nested_items.name: IsDefaultOnCreate
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this field is populated automatically when the object is created, such as a created at timestamp.

nested_items.name: SupportedValues
nested_items.description: A list of supported values for the field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SupportedFilterOperators
nested_items.description: Indicates the support filter operators for this field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ParentField
nested_items.description: A parent field name for a nested field.

nested_items.name: NativeDataType
nested_items.description: The data type returned by the SaaS API, such as 'picklist' or 'textarea' from Salesforce.

nested_items.name: CustomProperties
nested_items.description: Optional map of keys which may be returned.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, present if the current segment is not the last.
